text: Tumi yetiya sihamtara ocarata (sihamte bicaraa mate) kono ayata lai naha, tetiya sihamte kaya, ‘tumi nije'i eta ayata bana'i noloraa kiya’? Koraa, ‘mora pratipalakara taraphara paraa mora ocarata ahi hicape yi praerana karaa haya, ma'i kerala tarae'i anusarana karao. E'i kora'ana tomalokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa spasta pramana; arau e'ito imandara sampradayara babe hidayata arau rahamata’
